original_text: He wanted to see who Jesus was, but because he was short he could not see over the crowd.
korean_text: 그가 예수께서 어떠한 사람인가 하여 보고자 하되 키가 작고 사람이 많아 할 수 없어

sentences.original_text: He wanted to see who Jesus was
he could not see over the crowd
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 무리 너머를 볼 수 없었다
